definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: as son of Javan Ge 10:4, 1Ch 1:7; ´[[אִיֵּי א]] Ez Eze 27:7 (Aeolis Josephus Jer Kn; H. Derenbourg:Meêlanges Graux, 235 f (Eng. trans. Hbr. Oct. 1887, 7); Hellas Targum:Jon etc., Len Orig. ii. 2. 34 f; Italy, with Sicily, cf. [[מְדִינַת אִיטַלְיׇא]] Targum Ezek, Di Ge 10:4; Carthage = Elissa, Sta:De Populo Javan, 8 f; E. Meyer:Gesch. i. § 282; decision difficult; last view very attractive).
